column2: said Perks. ""You lie low till she's through
column3: and then we'll go up along to my place
column4: and see if there's any of them strawberries ripe what I told you about."""|The Railway Children|Edith Nesbit

column1: 15:14|I shall be back at exactly THREE fourteen
column2: for our hour of revery together
column3: real sweet revery darling|On the Road|Jack Kerouac
